1.content: Research & Technical Planning untuk Blockchain Integration
1.details:
1. Research Solana wallet integration (Phantom, Solflare)
2. Study Erebus Protocol's API endpoints dan SDK usage
3. Plan blockchain transaction flow (private deposits/transfers)
4. Research Jupiter Aggregator integration
5. Define technical architecture untuk privacy features

2.details:
1. Buat design system berdasarkan Erebus Protocol
2. Design landing page dengan privacy/blockchain theming
3. Design dashboard interface untuk users
4. Design wallet connection UI
5. Create responsive design untuk semua devices

3.details:
1. Setup React/Next.js frontend dengan wallet integration
2. Implement blockchain wallet connection (Phantom, Solflare)
3. Build backend API untuk blockchain interactions
4. Implement privacy transaction features (mock/simulation)
5. Integrate Jupiter Aggregator untuk token swapping
6. Build dashboard dengan real-time data
7. Setup Supabase untuk user management

4.details:
1. Test wallet integration di testnet/devnet
2. Test blockchain transactions dengan small amounts
3. Security testing untuk wallet connections
4. Performance optimization
5. Deploy to production environment
